title: How to manage to study the standard books for first year MBBS - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: My advice is solely on how to study the standard MBBS books for the first year; Step 1 - read (don’t mind whether you understand it or not) about the topics that is going to be taught for tomorrow. Step 2 - go to class and concentrate. Ask question if you don’t understand. Step 3 - go back and read the same pages that you read in Step 1. Ask your friend if you have confusion. Step 4 - go and see the lecturer if you still having difficulty to understand that topic. Step 5 - spend some times for sports and leisure. Don’t forget to get a boyfriend/girlfriend. Don’t be such a nerd. Trust me. Good luck!!!
